# ReadLevel — llms.txt
# https://readlevel.io

## What this site is
ReadLevel is a free, neutral readability checker. Users paste text and receive an instant reading level assessment, CEFR band estimate, grade equivalent, and plain-English explanation of who the text is suitable for. Text is analysed in the browser. Nothing is stored or sent to a server.

## What ReadLevel is for
- Checking how difficult a text is to read
- Estimating CEFR level (A1–C2) of a text
- Identifying whether text is appropriate for ESL learners, secondary students, or general readers
- Accessibility and readability reviews

## Guides available at /guides
- CEFR and readability: how they relate
- How to check if a text is suitable for ESL learners
- Reading levels explained (A1 to C2)
- Readability for UK secondary classrooms
- Readability and accessibility: a practical guide
- In the United States: CEFR vs ACTFL vs ILR

## Tool
- Free for single text checks
- No sign-up required
- No data stored
- Advanced features (batch checking, document upload, API) in development
